metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10812 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in HDF5 through 1.12.0. A NULL pointer dereferenceexists in the function H5F_get_nrefs() located in H5Fquery.c. It allows anattacker to cause Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
